channel.title: Miscs on The Radnor Arms

item.title: Opening Times
item.description: Bar Monday - Saturday 12:00 - 2:30pm 5:30 - 10:00pm Sunday 12:00 - 2:30pm Takeaway All takeaways are pre-order only. On weekdays, last orders by 6:30pm please; for Sunday last orders by 2pm on the Saturday. Monday - Saturday (menu) 5:30 - 7:00pm Sunday (menu) 12:00 - 12:30pm 2:00 - 2:30pm COVID-19 Constraints Takeaway do need to be pre-ordered and cannot be eaten inside.
